name: mblss

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, cr), wral(hs0, cpw(cr), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)))))))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c0 ⊆ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(ℝ),((vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` hs0)=((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0))))))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, cr))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wa(wss(c0, cr), wral(hs0, cpw(cr), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))))))))

-| diffsc(hs0, c0)

comment: A measurable set is a subset of the reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Mar-2014.)
